title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, double running, stem, montenegrin, cross, chain, eyelet, interlacing, and detached looping stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Horizontal bands of pattern followed by signature and text "Fear god and keep his commandments for that is the whole duty of man."
name: Sampler
